interface.name: mysql_signal
interface.summary: Send a generic signal to MySQL.

interface.name: mysql_stream_connect
interface.summary: Connect to MySQL using a unix domain stream socket.

interface.name: mysql_search_db
interface.summary: Search the directories that contain MySQL database storage.

interface.name: mysql_rw_db_dirs
interface.summary: Read and write to the MySQL database directory.

interface.name: mysql_manage_db_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete MySQL database directories.

interface.name: mysql_rw_db_sockets
interface.summary: Read and write to the MySQL database named socket.
